directions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in large bowl to blend. Add next 4 ingredients and toss to combine. Season salad with salt and pepper. Carefully open pita breads at cut end. Fill each with salad and serve.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons chopped pitted Kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives
3 cups (loosely packed) thinly sliced romaine lettuce
1 cucumber, peeled, halved, seeded, cut into 1/4-inch cubes
title: Greek Salad Pita Sandwiches
